Topic.Title: Bug report : Picture, sound and save game

Posts.EditableText:
I've added drawings (.jpg) and music to my game (.xm and .it) and sice then I can no longer open saved games. If I remove the sounds, all is correct again (it seems only the music is affecting the loaded game)

What is strange is this music only occurs at the beginning, and when I load the game there shouldn't be any music at all at this moment of the game.

(I'm using the new Quest 3.5, I can't tell if this happens too with the older versions)

Posts.EditableText: Strange. Could you send me your ASL and QSG files please? It may also help to send the XM and IT files if they're not too big. Thanks.
